newsitem.title: EU: EP Fisheries Committee agenda - June 16-17.
newsitem.headline: EP Fisheries Committee agenda - June 16-17.

text.p: Committee on Fisheries [[ Monday 16 June 1997 ]] PUBLIC HEARING 0. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE222.225 ) 2. Chairman's announcements ===] In the presence of the Commission 2.1 PUBLIC HEARING 2.2 FISHING EFFORT AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT 3. Welcoming by Mrs Carmen FRAGA ESTEVEZ, Chairman of the Committee on Fisheries ===] Interventions 4. Demetres KARAVELLAS (World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF International) - Greece) - "What is Sustainable Development in Fisheries Management?" 5. u lvaro FERN uNDEZ (I nstituto Espanol de Oceanografia (IEO) - Spain) - "Exploited resources as determining factors in the type of fisheries management" 6. Ron SMOLOWITZ (Woods Hall Oceanographic Institute of Massachusetts - U.S.A.) - "The Relationship Between Fishing Effort and Fishing Gears: How to Improve Selectivity" 7. Euan DUNN (Royal Society for the Protection of Birds (RSPB) - United Kingdom) - "Fishing Effort and Implications for the Environment" 8. Debate ===] 17 June at 9.00 am. ===] Interventions 9. Christian DINTHEER (IFREMER - France) - "Fishing Effort in the North Sea" 10. Amelia MIGUEIS (Directorate General for Fisheries - Portugal) - "Fishing Effort in the Atlantic Ocean" 11. Nazzareno LUCANTONI (Lega Pesca - Italy) - "Fishing Effort in the Mediterranean Sea" 12. Carlos REIS (INP - Portugal) - Fishing Effort in the Waters of Countries with which the European Union has Established Fisheries Agreements 13. Debate 14. Decision on procedure (possibly) 15. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure (possibly) 16. Any other business 17. Date of next meeting in Brussels (PE/XVII/OJ/97-10 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
